properties.name: gateway.routes
properties.description: Declarative route definitions exposed through the API gateway.

properties.name: gateway.webclient.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout applied to downstream WebClient calls.

properties.name: gateway.webclient.response-timeout
properties.description: Overall response timeout for downstream WebClient calls.

properties.name: gateway.subscription.validation-uri
properties.description: URI template used to validate tenant subscriptions before routing.

properties.name: gateway.admin.aggregation.services
properties.description: Downstream admin services aggregated into the admin dashboard endpoints.

properties.name: app.configuration-version
properties.description: Monotonically increasing identifier representing the currently active configuration snapshot.

properties.name: jasypt.encryptor.password
properties.description: Password used by Jasypt to decrypt ENC(...) values provided by the Config Server.
